pkgmetadata.longdescription: oursql is a set of MySQL bindings for python 2.4+ with a focus on wrapping the `MYSQL_STMT API`__ to provide real parameterization and real server-side cursors. MySQL 4.1.2 or better is required. __ http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/c-api-prepared-statements.html There's extensive documentation available online at http://packages.python.org/oursql/.
